TunableTuple.name: FRONT_DOOR_AVAILABILITY_STATE
TunableTuple.description: State values for front door availability.

Tunable.name: disabled
Tunable.description: State value for door being unavailable to be a front door.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: State value for door being available to be a front door.

TunableTuple.name: FRONT_DOOR_STATE
TunableTuple.description: State values for a door is or isn't a front door.

Tunable.name: disabled
Tunable.description: State value for door is not front door.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: State value for door is front door.

TunableTuple.name: INACTIVE_APARTMENT_DOOR_STATE
TunableTuple.description: State values for a door is or isn't for an inactive apartment.

Tunable.name: disabled
Tunable.description: State value for door is not for an inactive apartment.

Tunable.name: enabled
Tunable.description: State value for door is for an inactive apartment.
